title: Getting Started
snippet: This is a starter template for creating a beautiful, customizable blog with minimal effort. You’ll only have to change a few settings and you’re ready to go.

title: Customizing Your Site
snippet: This starter template comes pre-loaded with Tailwind CSS, a utility CSS framework that allows you to customize and build complex designs without touching a line of CSS.
